Title: Bury vengeance bamboo tips to eliminate the American bandits
Designer: Department of Fine Arts, Southwest Normal University (西南师范学院美术系)
Publisher: Sichuan renmin meishu chubanshe (四川人民出美术版社)
Notes: Sharpened bamboo stakes ("punji sticks") were used by the North Vietnamese, camouflaged by undergrowth or in camouflaged pits.
